info.title: Business API
info.description: Enterprise-grade middleware API for CAC.gov.ng business registration. All 46 core routes documented.

apiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
apiKeyAuth.description: Use 'Authorization: Token ck_...' for customer API key auth

CustomerApiKey.name: Authorization
CustomerApiKey.description: Customer API key in format: Token ck_your_api_key_here

message.example: Invalid or expired customer API key

List recent masked keys from sqlite vault

Indicates whether the service is alive and functioning
Ping endpoint to verify API key without consuming credits

get.description: Get system health and status information
Get detailed usage analytics and statistics

get.description: Get recent actions performed by the authenticated admin

get.description: Get all API keys for a specific customer
Get comprehensive API statistics and monitoring data (admin only)

post.description: Change the password for the authenticated admin

Check if a proposed business name is available and not too similar to existing registered names. Uses CAC API for validation.

**Authentication Required:** Customer API Key

**Authorization Header:**
```
Authorization: Token ck_your_api_key_here
```

**Pricing:** Charged per request based on your plan

proposedName.description: The proposed business name to check

error.message: Customer API key is required. Format: Authorization: Token ck_...

post.description:
Submit a business name registration request to Documents.com.ng API.

**Authentication Required:** Customer API Key

**Authorization Header:**
```
Authorization: Token ck_your_api_key_here
```

**Important Notes:**
- Perform name search first before registration
- Ensure all required fields are provided
- Registration is submitted to Documents.com.ng for processing

**Pricing:** Charged per successful submission

business_type.description: BN for Business Name, IT for Incorporated Trustee

business_name.description: The business name to register (must pass name search first)

ref.description: Your unique reference ID for tracking

post.description:
Submit a complete company registration request with witness information to Documents.com.ng.

**Authentication Required:** Customer API Key

**Authorization Header:**
```
Authorization: Token ck_your_api_key_here
```

**Important:**
- This is for LIMITED company registration (RC)
- All witness information must be provided
- Documents are submitted to CAC via Documents.com.ng

**Pricing:** Charged per successful submission

Verify a Nigerian Bank Verification Number using QoreID.

**Authentication Required:** Customer API Key

**Authorization Header:**
```
Authorization: Token ck_your_api_key_here
```

**BVN Format:** 11-digit number

**Note:** BVN verification requires special QoreID account permissions.

**Pricing:** 100 per verification

403.description: BVN verification not enabled on QoreID account

post.summary: Verify Driver's License with Face Match
post.description:
Verify Nigerian driver's license and match with face photo using QoreID.

**Authentication Required:** Customer API Key

**Authorization Header:**
```
Authorization: Token ck_your_api_key_here
```

**Image Options:** Provide EITHER photoBase64 OR photoUrl (not both)

**Pricing:** 150 per verification

photoUrl.description: Public URL to photo (use this OR photoBase64)

400.description: Invalid request or missing required fields

post.description:
Verify Nigerian Permanent Voter's Card using QoreID.

**Authentication Required:** Customer API Key

**Authorization Header:**
```
Authorization: Token ck_your_api_key_here
```

**VIN:** Voter Identification Number

**Pricing:** 150 per verification

dob.description: Date of birth (Format: YYYY-MM-DD). Note: field is 'dob' not 'dateOfBirth'

post.description:
Verify Nigerian passport details without face verification using QoreID.

**Authentication Required:** Customer API Key

**Authorization Header:**
```
Authorization: Token ck_your_api_key_here
```

**Note:** This endpoint does NOT require a photo. For face verification, use `/passport-face-verification`

**Pricing:** 150 per verification

Verify Nigerian passport and match with face photo using QoreID.

**Authentication Required:** Customer API Key

**Authorization Header:**
```
Authorization: Token ck_your_api_key_here
```

**Image Options:** Provide EITHER photoBase64 OR photoUrl (not both)

**Pricing:** 200 per verification

idNumber.description: Nigerian passport number (Note: field is 'idNumber' not 'passportNumber')

photoUrl.description: Public URL to photo (use this OR photoBase64)

400.description: Invalid request or missing required fields
